Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot

Class TextTranslations

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.TextTranslations
public class TextTranslations extends Object

Error messages to use with specification archetypes. All methods are static and return an array of two messages, an action message and a constraint message. The former explains what should be done to fix the problem while the latter gives the cause of the problem.

Supports various languages (cf. Language). [Well, currently only English and French are supported. Translations to other languages welcome]

Author:
Ian Davies - 14 Mar. 2021

      public static String[] getTREE_MULTIPLE_ROOTS​(List<String> refs, int nRoots)
      Error message: a tree has multiple roots.
      Parameters:
      refs - the list of tree nodes without a parent (= the multiple roots)
      nRoots - number of tree root nodes found
      Returns:
      action and constraint messages in a String array

    • getEDGE_RANGE_INCORRECT

      public static String[] getEDGE_RANGE_INCORRECT​(int nEdges, au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util.IntegerRange range, String edgeLabel, String nodeName, String toNodeRef)
      Error message: node has a wrong number of edges compared to multiplicity
      Parameters:
      nEdges - the number of edges found
      range - the expected number of edges (multiplicity)
      edgeLabel - the expected edge class id
      nodeName - the node id
      toNodeRef - the reference of the (other) end node
      Returns:
      action and constraint messages in a String array
